name: Dr. Jen Wolkin | ADHD + Trauma + Anxiety Info

content.html: When we are overstimulated, even if we are perceiving over-stimulation, we can go into what’s called our Freeze Response. When we are overwhelmed and stressed, instead of action, we SHUT DOWN.
content.value:
When we are overstimulated, even if we are perceiving over-stimulation, we can go into what’s called our Freeze Response. 

When we are overwhelmed and stressed, instead of action, we SHUT DOWN.
